reviewText:
This basically covers rolling, leg traps, sweeps, and very basic hip throws. It's nothing ground breaking but at the same time, it is worth a look if you are considering san shou.  It gives you a sense of what you might encounter in the tournaments.  Moreover, it does provide a few things that you can add to your game.

If you are a kung fu instructor, you probably know most of this, but the nice thing about it is that videos like this package portions of your art into a curriculum that you can build around if you want to start your school into competing san shou.
